property.name: fieldDescription
property.value: The daily content has two modes: normal and periodical. The normal mode will look for a page under today's date e.g. /content/cru/us/en/daily-content/2014/05/03 or /content/cru/us/en/daily-content/05/03 and display that content. If the periodical checkbox is checked, this component will check if today's date is within the dates selected. If it is, this component will look for a page that matches. e.g if the dates selected are 2014/05/05 to 2014/05/06 and today is 2014/05/05, this component will select the content from the first page found and display it.
